column2: "Na Solomon hyiahyiaa Israel mpanyimfo
column3: na ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu etsitsir nyinara
column4: Israelmba egyanom efiefi mbapɔmba no
column5: ma wɔbaa ne nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm
column6: dɛ wɔrekɛfa EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka no efi Zion a ɔyɛ David kurow no mu aba."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no nyinara hyiahyiaa hɔnho behyiaa ɔhen Solomon ne nkyɛn wɔ afahyɛ no ase
column3: wɔ bosoom Etanim a ɔyɛ bosoom a otsia esuon no mu."

column2: "Na Israel mpanyimfo no nyinara bae
column3: na asɔfo no bɔsoaa adaka no."

column2: "Na wɔdze EWURADZE n’adakaa no
column3: na ehyiadzibuw no
column4: na ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn a ɔwɔ Buw no mu no bae; mekyerɛ iyinom na asɔfo na Levifo no dze bae."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Solomon na Israel mpanyimfo no a woebehyia wɔ ne nkyɛn no nyinara dzi adaka no enyim
column3: rukuku nguan na anantwi a osian hɔn dodow ntsi wonntum nkan eso wommbu ano dze robobɔ afɔr."

column2: "Na asɔfo no dze EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka no besii ne sibew
column3: wɔ ɔdan no ne mpiakyir
column4: bea krɔnkrɔnkrɔn no
column5: mekyerɛ kerubfo no ntsaban ase."

column2: "Na kerubfo no atserɛtserɛw hɔn ntsaban mu wɔ adaka no ne sibew no do
column3: na kerubfo no akata adaka no na no ho mpoma no do wɔ sor."

column2: "Na mpoma no wowar dodow ma wohu mpoma no n’etsir wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn mpiakyir no enyim; na wonnhu wɔ abowano: na mbrɛ ɔwɔ ara nye no dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
"Hweeara nnyi adaka no mu gyedɛ abo apon ebien no a Moses dze guu mu wɔ Horeb no
column3: wɔ aber a wofi Egypt asaase do reba no a EWURADZE nye Israelmba dzii ahyɛmu no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a asɔfo no fii bea krɔnkrɔn no do puei no
column4: mununkum bɛhyɛɛ EWURADZE ne dan no ma
column6: "na mununkum no ntsi asɔfo no enntum enngyina annsom: osiandɛ nna EWURADZE n’enyimnyam ahyɛ EWURADZE ne dan no ma."

column2: "Nna Solomon kaa dɛ
column3: EWURADZE ase dɛ ɔbɛtsena sum kebii mu."

column2: "Ampa mesi ɔdan ayɛ tsenabew ama wo
column3: beebi a ebɛtsena hɔ daa."

column2: "Na ɔhen no daan n’enyim
column3: na ohyiraa Israel mboanofo no nyinara: na Israel mboanofo no nyinara gyinagyinaa tsentsen."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Nhyira nka EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn a ɔdze n’ano kasaa kyerɛɛ m’egya David
column5: na ɔdze ne nsa ahyɛ no ma
column8: "Ofitsi da a medze me man Israel fii Egypt bae no
column9: mannsan mu ennyi kurow bi emmfi Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu dɛ wonsi dan
column10: ama me dzin aatsena hɔ; mbom mesaan mu miyii David dɛ ɔnhwɛ me man Israel do."

column2: "Afei ɔwɔ m’egya David n’akoma mu dɛ obesi dan ama EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no ne dzin."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see m’egya David dɛ
column3: Susuampa dɛ ɔwɔ w’akoma mu dɛ nkyɛ ibesi dan ama me dzin no
column4: eyɛɛ no yie dɛ ɔwɔ w’akoma mu:"

column2: "naaso ɔwoara nnkesi dan no; na mbom wo ba a ofi w’asen mu bɛba no
column3: ɔno na obesi dan no ama me dzin."

column2: "Na EWURADZE ama n’asɛm a ɔkae no etsim; na masoɛr ahyɛ m’egya David n’ananmu
column3: na metse Israel ahengua do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE bɔɔ anohoba no
column5: na mesi dan no ama EWURADZE

column2: "Na meyi hɔ beebi ama adaka no a EWURADZE ahyɛmu a ɔnye hɛn egyanom dzii
column3: wɔ aber a ɔdze hɔn fi Egypt asaase do reba no wɔ mu no."

column2: "Na Solomon gyinaa EWURADZE n’afɔrmbukyia no enyim wɔ Israel mboanofo no nyinara enyim
column3: na ɔtserɛɛw ne nsamu wɔ sor:"

column2: "na ɔsee dɛ
column3: EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn
column5: Onyankopɔn bi nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo
column9: wɔ famu: ɔwo a isie ahyɛmu na mbɔbɔrhu ma wo nkowaa a wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara nantsew w’enyim:"

column2: "ɔwo a esie dza ebɔɔ anohoba maa w’akowaa m’egya David no ama no: nyew
column3: ɔwo edze w’ano kae
column4: na edze wo nsa ahyɛ no ma
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn
column5: sie dza abɔ anohoba ama w’akowaa m’egya David no ma no dɛ
column6: Nyimpa a ɔbɛtsena Israel ahengua do rommbɔ wo wɔ m’enyim; sɛ wo mba hwɛ hɔn kwan yie ara
column7: dɛ wɔbɛnantsew m’enyim dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo nantseew m’enyim no a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn e
column4: meserɛ wo
column5: ma w’asɛm a ekaa kyerɛɛ w’akowaa m’egya David no ntsim."

column2: "Na aso ampa dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛtsena asaase do? Hwɛ
column3: ɔsor na ɔsor mu sor mpo nntum nnkora wo; na akantam ɔdan yi a mesi!"

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn bu w’akowaa ne mpaabɔ
column3: na no ntotɔserɛ bi
column4: dɛ ibetsie w’akowaa ne nkekamu na ne mpaabɔ
column5: a ɔrobɔ no wɔ w’enyim ndɛ da yi:"

column2: "dɛ w’enyi bobue wɔ ɔdan yi do adzesaa na adzekyee
column3: mekyerɛ bea a ɔwoara ase dɛ
column4: Me dzin bɛtsena hɔ no do: dɛ ibetsie mpaabɔ a w’akowaa robɔ akyerɛ bea yi do no."

column2: "Na tsie w’akowaa
column3: na wo man Israel ntotɔserɛ
column4: aber a wɔrobɔ mpaa kyerɛ bea yi do: nyew
column5: tsie no wɔ ɔsor wo tsenabea hɔ; na sɛ etse a

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi yɛ bɔn tsia ne nyɛnko
column3: na ntam bɛda no do dɛ ɔka
column4: na ɔba bɛka ntam wɔ w’afɔrmbukyia enyim wɔ fie yi mu a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie wɔ ɔsor
column3: na yɛ
column4: na bu wo nkowaa atsɛn
column5: dɛ irubu ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi no fɔ
column6: ma no kwan eebua nankasa n’etsifi: na irubu ɔtseneneenyi no bem
column7: ama no dɛ mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛtsenenee tse."

column2: "Sɛ wɔka wo man Israel gu wɔ atamfo enyim
column3: osiandɛ wɔayɛ bɔn etsia wo ntsi; na sɛ wɔsan ba wo nkyɛn bio
column4: na wɔbɔ wo dzin
column5: na wɔbɔ wo mpaa na wɔtotɔ serɛ wo wɔ fie yi mu a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie wɔ ɔsor
column3: na fa wo man Israel hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn
column4: na fa hɔn bra asaase a ɔwoara dze maa hɔn egyanom no do bio."

column2: "Sɛ wɔtow ɔsor mu
column3: na nsu nntɔ
column4: osiandɛ wɔayɛ bɔn etsia wo ntsi; sɛ wɔbɔ mpaa kyerɛ bea yi do
column5: na wɔbɔ wo dzin
column6: na wɔsan fi hɔn bɔn ho

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie wɔ ɔsor
column3: na fa wo nkowaa
column4: na wo man Israel hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn
column5: dɛ erekyerɛ hɔn ɔkwan pa a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔfa do; na ma nsu ntɔ ngu w’asaase a ɔwoara dze ama wo man dɛ egyapadze no do."

column2: "Sɛ ɔkɔm ba asaase no do
column3: sɛ ɔyardɔm ba
column4: sɛ ohuw anaa ɔpo
column5: mbɛbɛw anaa nkonyinko ba; sɛ hɔn atamfo botua hɔn wɔ nkuropon asaase do; owuyar biara

column2: "mpaabɔ na ntotɔserɛ biara a nyimpa biara
column3: anaa wo man Israel nyinara bɛyɛ a nyimpa biara bohu nankasa n’akoma mu ɔhaw na ɔbɛtrɛ ne nsamu akyerɛ fie yi do no:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie wɔ ɔsor wo tsenabea hɔ
column3: na fa kyɛ
column4: na yɛ
column5: na ma nyimpa biara dɛ mbrɛ n’akwan nyinara tse
column6: nyia ɔwoara nyim n’akoma mu a; (osiandɛ ɔwo
column7: mekyerɛ ɔwoara nkotoo na inyim nyimpa mba nyinara hɔn akoma mu;)"

column2: "ama woeesuro wo wɔ nda nyinara a wɔdze bɛtsena asaase a ɔwoara edze maa hɛn egyanom no do no."
"Nkyii so ɔhɔho a ommfi wo man Israel mu ho dze
column3: sɛ osian wo dzin ntsi ma ofi ekyirekyir man bi mu ba;"

column2: "(osiandɛ wɔbɛtse wo dzin kɛse no
column3: na wo nsa dzendzen no
column4: na w’abasa a atsen mu no nka;) sɛ ɔba bɔbɔ mpaa kyerɛ ɔdan yi do a:"

column2: "ɔwoara tsie wɔ ɔsor wo tsenabea
column3: na yɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔhɔho no rusu frɛ wo no nyinara: ama asaase do aman nyinara aatse wo dzin
column4: na woeesuro wo
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wo man Israel yɛ
column6: na woeehu dɛ wo dzin na wɔdze frɛ ɔdan yi a mesi yi."

column2: "Sɛ wo man fir edzi nye hɔn atamfo kedzi ako wɔ ɔkwan biara a ɔwoara bɔsoma hɔn do
column3: na wɔbɔ EWURADZE mpaa kyerɛ kurow a asan mu eyi
column4: na ɔdan a mesi ama wo dzin yi do a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie hɔn mpaabɔ na hɔn ntotɔserɛ wɔ ɔsor
column3: na dzi hɔn asɛm ma hɔn."

column2: "Sɛ wɔyɛ bɔn tsia wo
column3: (osiandɛ nyimpa bi nnyi hɔ a ɔnnyɛ bɔn
column4: ) na wo bo fuw hɔn
column5: na iyi hɔn ma atamfo
column6: ma wɔfa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔ atamfo asaase do ekyirekyir o

column2: "na afei sɛ hɔnara wɔdwen wɔ asaase a wɔafa hɔn ndɔmmum akɔ do no do
column3: na wɔsan bio
column4: na wɔtotɔ serɛ wo wɔ hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree no hɔn asaase do
column5: dɛ

column2: "sɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara na hɔn kra nyinara san ba wo nkyɛn wɔ hɔn atamfo a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree no hɔn asaase do
column3: na wɔbɔ mpaa kyerɛ hɔn asaase a ɔwoara dze maa hɔn egyanom
column4: kurow a ɔwoara asan mu eyi
column5: na ɔdan a mesi ama wo dzin yi do a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie hɔn mpaabɔ na hɔn ntotɔserɛ wɔ ɔsor wo tsenabea
column3: na dzi hɔn asɛm ma hɔn;"

column2: "na fa wo man a wɔayɛ bɔn etsia wo
column3: na hɔn mbrato a wɔafom wɔ mu etsia wo nyinara kyɛ hɔn; na ma hɔn mbɔbɔrhu wɔ hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree no enyim
column4: nyew
column5: ma wonhu hɔn mbɔbɔr:"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔyɛ wo man
column3: na w’egyapadze a iyii hɔn wɔ Egypt wɔ dadze fononoo no mu bae:"

column2: "na ma w’enyiwa nkɔ w’akowaa no ntotɔserɛ
column3: na wo man Israel ntotɔserɛ do dɛ ibetsie hɔn mber biara a wosu frɛ wo no."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔwoara na etseew hɔn fii asaase do aman nyinara mu dɛ wɔyɛ w’egyapadze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔwoara nam w’akowaa Moses n’abaw do kae no
column4: wɔ aber a edze hɔn egyanom fi Egypt reba no
column5: ao EWURADZE Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Solomon wiee mpaa ɔbɔ maa EWURADZE na ntotɔserɛ nyinara no
column4: ɔsoɛree fii EWURADZE afɔrmbukyia no enyim
column5: na ogyaa n’anankoroma enyim kosɔw nye ne nsamu trɛ a ɔtrɛɛ kyerɛɛ ɔsor do no."

column2: "Na ogyinae
column3: na ɔdze ndze kɛse hyiraa Israel mboanofo no nyinara
column4: dɛ
column6: "Nhyira nka EWURADZE a ɔama ne man Israel ahomgye
column7: dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ anohoba no nyinara tse: n’anohoba pa a ɔnam n’akowaa Moses ne nsa do bɔe no nyinara mu asɛm kor mpo annyew."

column2: "EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ndzi hɛn ekyir
column3: dɛ mbrɛ odzii hɛn egyanom ekyir no: ma mma onngyaa hɛn
column4: na eso ɔmmpa hɛn:"

column2: "ama ɔaadan hɛn akoma akɔ no do
column3: dɛ yɛbɛnantsew n’akwan nyinara mu
column4: na yeedzi ne mbransɛm
column5: na n’ahyɛdze
column6: na n’atsɛmbu a ɔdze hyɛɛ hɛn egyanom no do."

column2: "Na ma me nsɛm yi a medze edzi ntotɔserɛ wɔ EWURADZE enyim yi mbɛn EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn adzekyee na adzesaa
column3: ma ondzi n’akowaa n’asɛm
column4: na ne man Israel hɔn asɛm mma hɔn
column5: dɛ mbrɛ da biara dze bɛba:"

column2: "ama asaase do aman nyinara woeehu dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn: na obi nnyi hɔ bio."
"Dɛm ntsi hom mma hom akoma ndzi mu wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ho
column3: dɛ wɔbɛnantsew n’ahyɛdze mu
column4: na woedzi ne mbransɛm do dɛ ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔhen no
column3: na Israel nyinara ka no ho bɔɔ afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na Solomon dze anantwi mpemeduonu ebien
column3: na nguan mpemɔha eduonu
column4: bɔɔ asomdwee afɔr a ɔbɔe maa EWURADZE no. Dɛm na ɔhen no na Israelmba no nyinara dze buee EWURADZE ne fie no."

column2: "Da no ara ɔhen no yɛɛ EWURADZE ne dan no enyim dampan no ne finimfin no krɔnkrɔn; na hɔ na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na edziban afɔr
column3: na asomdwee afɔr ne seradze no: osiandɛ boran afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE enyim no suar dodow dɛ ɔbɛgye ɔhyew afɔr
column4: na asomdwee afɔr ho seradze no."

column2: "Nna Solomon hyɛɛ fa no aber no mu
column3: na Israel nyinara ka no ho
column4: mboanofo kɛse
column5: wofi Hamat ahɛnee kodu Egypt ɔwora no ho
column6: wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim nda esuon na nda esuon

column2: "Da a otsia awɔtwe no ogyaa ɔman no kwan
column3: na wohyiraa ɔhen no
column4: na wɔdze papa nyinara a EWURADZE ayɛ ama n’akowaa David
column5: na ne man Israel no ho enyigye na akoma pa sii mu kɔr hɔn asesee mu."
